TITLE: Installing Dependencies with Poetry
DESCRIPTION: Installs project dependencies using Poetry, compiles Cython code, and creates an isolated virtual environment. This step is essential for setting up the development environment with the required packages and libraries.
SOURCE: https://github.com/aressc2/queenbot/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: Shell
CODE:
```
poetry install
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running the Bot with Poetry
DESCRIPTION: Executes the bot using Poetry, running the `run.py` script within the project's virtual environment. It assumes the bot name and race have been configured in `config.yml`
SOURCE: https://github.com/aressc2/queenbot/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: Shell
CODE:
```
poetry run python run.py
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Cloning the Git Repository
DESCRIPTION: Clones the git repository, ensuring submodules are included. The `--recursive` flag is crucial for fetching the necessary submodules, particularly for ares-sc2 dependencies.
SOURCE: https://github.com/aressc2/queenbot/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: Shell
CODE:
```
git clone --recursive <git_repo_url_here>
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Updating ares-sc2
DESCRIPTION: Executes the `update_ares.py` script to update the ares-sc2 library. This ensures the bot is using the latest version of the library with potential bug fixes and improvements.
SOURCE: https://github.com/aressc2/queenbot/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: Python
CODE:
```
python update_ares.py
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Listing Poetry Environment Path
DESCRIPTION: Lists the full path of the Poetry-managed virtual environment. This path is required when configuring the Python interpreter in PyCharm.
SOURCE: https://github.com/aressc2/queenbot/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: Shell
CODE:
```
poetry env list --full-path
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Formatting Code with Black
DESCRIPTION: Formats the code using the Black code formatter. This enforces a consistent code style throughout the project, improving readability and maintainability.
SOURCE: https://github.com/aressc2/queenbot/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: Shell
CODE:
```
black .
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Sorting Imports with isort
DESCRIPTION: Sorts the imports in the code using the isort tool. This helps organize imports and maintain a consistent import style, making the code easier to understand.
SOURCE: https://github.com/aressc2/queenbot/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: Shell
CODE:
```
isort .
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Changing to the Bot's Directory
DESCRIPTION: Navigates to the directory where the bot's code resides. Replace `<bot_folder>` with the actual name of the directory you cloned.
SOURCE: https://github.com/aressc2/queenbot/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: Shell
CODE:
```
cd <bot_folder>
```
